title: [Large-scale] Personalized Language Education Course Design Based on Academic Achievement Prediction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Learning Experience and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Provision of situation-based learning content to strengthen job relevance for current professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their language proficiency improvement trends with 80% or higher accuracy through diagnostic assessments provided every two weeks.
Learners can achieve their target language proficiency (e.g., TOPIK Level 4) within six months by utilizing a personalized learning path based on predictive modeling.
Learners can maintain a learning consistency rate of over 90% by completing 15-minute microlearning modules three times a week in a mobile environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
